title: Football Manager 2009 Patch 9.2.0 New Crack (No Bug)
description:
IMPORTANT INFO:

With this method game thinks it's using 9.1.0 update but it doesn't.In the game status bar you will see 9.1.0 but DON'T PANIC.
It's 9.2.0 update and entire 9.2.0 database.We will simply update the game manually and use 9.1.0 crack method to crack it with no bugs.

CHECKING THE UPDATE:

You can look for Huntelaar transfer and other transfers, updates stats etc to check the game database.

Quote from 9.2.0 change list: "Added home page menu item to bookmarks menu"
You can look for it and other game changes to check game updates.I quoted this because you can check it as soon as the game starts.

No bugs (no more holiday problem, no more sacking after 1st season, less injuries)


HOW TO USE:

1-) Reinstall FM 2009 and update your game to 9.1.0
2-) Go to C:Program FilesSports InteractiveFootball Manager 2009data
    delete "updates" folder and paste the new "updates" folder in the rar file.
3-] Copy Certificates in All Users folder to C:Documents and SettingsAll UsersApplication DataSports Interactive and
    Copy Certificates in Your Users folder to C:Documents and Settings*youruser*Application DataSports Interactive
4-) Copy fm.exe to game directory
5-) Activate the game with this key - 8sfa70iy7naat8miiwwvh5v0e . It will say the key is wrong but don't give a fuck to it.
6-) Block Football Manager 2009 (fm.exe) in windows firewall settings (simply delete it from programs. YOU MUST DO THIS AFTER 5TH STEP)


Start the game with your shortcut.

Thank you to Permaximum for the cleverly crack.

Ronaldo-Corinthians
